meanings.definition: A chronic skin disorder characterized by red patches covered with white scales.
meanings.sent1: My aunt has psoriases on her elbows, causing red patches and white scales.

meanings.sent3: Despite his psoriases, John always wears long sleeves to hide the red patches.
